Skywalk.name: Skywalk
Skywalk.description: Build on L2 and L3 over roads
Skywalk.noRoad: Must be placed over road or track
Skywalk.needsExisting: Connect to existing wall or concrete
Skywalk.sizeTooBig: Skywalk section too big; max 20 on each side
Skywalk.fourCorners: Below the four corners must be empty or walls
Skywalk.invalidObjectBelow: Can't build skywalk over object below
Skywalk.taxiwayProximityError: Too close to Taxiway or Runway
Skywalk.obstructions: Must be sufficiently clear of nearby obstructions
